cast.overview: A gambler discovers an old flame while in Argentina, but she's married to his new boss.
cast.title: Gilda

cast.overview: A holiday favourite for generations...  George Bailey has spent his entire life giving to the people of Bedford Falls.  All that prevents rich skinflint Mr. Potter from taking over the entire town is George's modest building and loan company.  But on Christmas Eve the business's $8,000 is lost and George's troubles begin.
cast.title: It's a Wonderful Life

details.biography:
Mark Roberts (June 9, 1921 - January 5, 2006) was an American stage, film and television support actor who appeared in over 100 films between 1938 and 1994, according to the Internet Movie Database. Sometimes he was credited as Bob Scott, Robert E. Scott, or Robert Scott. He is survived by his three children.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Mark Roberts, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Mark Roberts
